question: Which among the following is the Objective of the Kusum Scheme?
option2: Distibution of Electric pumps to farmers
option3: Replace diesel pumps of farmers with solar pumps
answer: Replace diesel pumps of farmers with solar pumps
explanation: Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan(KUSUM) -This scheme seeks to replace all diesel pump-sets with solar pumps and the excess power generated through solar panels will be purchased by state governments at a price that gives the farmer a good profit.
